title: Start
body:
<<You>>  
<<emotion angry>> 
All I can remember after crap went down on the island was a falling branch and hurting my head.
Now, i'm on the verge of awakeing from a nap.
I'm weirdly warm, like something is blowing warm air at me.
<<UN>> 
Awaken, boy.
<<You>> 
Nuh uh 5 more minutes...
<<UN>>
HEY.
WAKE.
UP.
NOW!!!!!
[[Please don’t kill me.|1A]]
[[(Say nothing)|1B]]
[[This isn’t real! You are not real. This is just a hallucination.|1C]]

title: 1A
body:
<<emotion happy>>
Calm down, I’m not gonna kill you. I just want you to open all the gates so I can see my daughter.
<<addmeter 10>> 
[[2nd]]

title: 1B
body:
Hello??  Can’t you speak the words that are coming out of my mouth boy?
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[2nd]]

title: 1C
body:
<<emotion happy>>
I’m real alright and you will help me get out.
[[2nd]]

title: 2nd
body:
<<emotion happy>>
Okay, let me try this again.
<<sasha>>
Hi, I am Sasha.
And you will help me and my daughter.
Or you shall be stomped.
[[Only if you can get me out of here alive successfully|2A]]
[[“Stomp on me?” I’m an ant compared to you.|2B]]
[[What! No, I cant let you things out!!!|2C]]

title: 2A
body:
<<emotion angry>>
You don’t trust me, boy!!!
[[I… just want to go home|A1]]
[[We both get what we want and the name is “Robert”|A2]]
[[You and your child can’t get out without me.|A3]]

title: 2B
body:
<<emotion angry>>
YOU CALLING ME FAT?
[[Yeah, fatter than yo mama|B1]]
[[No uh…. You got a ideal figure for dinosaur|B2]]
[[I just saying that with your size there might be an accident|B3]]

title: 2C
body:
<<emotion angry>>
Find then, Ill find another human.
And have you for lunch...
<<chomp>>
*CHOMP*
<<lessmeter 200>>
dead

title: A1
body:
<<emotion normal>>
<<addmeter 5>>
Hmm… okay, but be warn do not get in my way again or your never getting home
[[3rd]]

title: A2
body:
<<emotion happy>>
<<addmeter 20>>
Smart one. I don’t like that in my preys, but I allow this once Robert.
[[3rd]]

title: A3
body:
YOU THINK YOU CAN USE MY CHILD TO CONTROL ME!!!!!!!
<<chomp>>
*She crunches your head*
<<lessmeter 200>>
dead

title: 3rd
body:
<<You>>
*We began walking forward, looking for her daughter*
*Thats when we were attacked by a group of blood hungry raptors*
<<emotion sad>>
*They got the upperhand of Sasha*
*so I picked up a rock and tossed it at the raptors*
<<emotion happy>>
*Sasha was now able to fight back, and she scared off the raptors*
<<sasha>>
<<emotion love>>
That was close. Why did you help me?
[[We made a deal and without you, I will get eaten alive by those raptors|3A]]
[[They were attacking you and I just [i]had[/i] to do something|3B]]
[[I was very hesitant if I should make a run for it|3C]]

title: B3
body:
<<emotion normal>>
If you weren’t the only one alive I would have crushed you.
<<addmeter 20>>
[[3rd]]

title: 3A
body:
<<addmeter 10>>
I will honor you the same then.
[[end]]

title: 3C
body:
<<emotion angry>>
<<lessmeter 10>>
Are you having a laugh? If not then, then let move now.
[[end]]

title: end
body:
*Thus, we continued though the woods, soon finding her daughter*
*She was in an electric cage. This could be bad*
*I grabbed anyways. I made a deal*
<<end>>
end
